metadata.title: CVE-2023-39197 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds read vulnerability was found in Netfilter ConnectionTracking (conntrack) in the Linux kernel. This flaw allows a remote user todisclose sensitive information via the DCCP protocol.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-39197` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-36-generic - 6.2.0-36.37
linux-image-6.2.0-36-generic-lpae - 6.2.0-36.37
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-36-generic - 6.2.0-36.37
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-36-generic-64k - 6.2.0-36.37
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1016-kvm - 6.2.0-1016.16
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1015-aws - 6.2.0-1015.15
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1016-azure - 6.2.0-1016.16
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1018-gcp - 6.2.0-1018.20
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1016-lowlatency - 6.2.0-1016.16
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1016-lowlatency-64k - 6.2.0-1016.16
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1015-oracle - 6.2.0-1015.15
No subscription required

linux-image-6.2.0-1016-raspi - 6.2.0-1016.18
No subscription required

linux-image-6.2.0-1008-starfive - 6.2.0-1008.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.2.0-36.37').
linux-kvm package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.2.0-1016.16').
linux-allwinner: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support').
linux-aws package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.2.0-1015.15').
linux-azure package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.2.0-1016.16').
linux-gcp package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.2.0-1018.20').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
linux-lowlatency package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.2.0-1016.16').
linux-oracle package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.2.0-1015.15').
linux-raspi package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.2.0-1016.18').
linux-starfive package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.2.0-1008.9').
